001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JarCommand;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavacCommand;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.PathSupport;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.DeclaredModule;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.FolderType;
011import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
012import java.nio.file.Path;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.List;
015
016/** Compiles and archives Java source files. */
017public class CompileWorkflow extends AbstractSpaceWorkflow {
018
019  public CompileWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project, ProjectSpace space) {
020    super(bach, project, space);
021  }
022
023  protected JavacCommand computeJavacCommand(Path classes) {
024    var computedModuleSourcePath = ModuleSourcePathComputer.compute(space);
025    return Command.javac()
026        .modules(space.modules().names())
027        .option(computeReleaseOption())
028        .option(computedModuleSourcePath.patterns())
029        .option(computedModuleSourcePath.specifics())
030        .option(computeModulePathsOption())
031        .outputDirectoryForClasses(classes);
032  }
033
034  protected JavacCommand computeMultiReleaseJavacCommand(
035      int release, String module, Path classes, List<Path> javaSourceFiles) {
036    return Command.javac()
037        .option(JavacCommand.ReleaseOption.of(release))
038        .option(computeModulePathsOption())
039        .add("--class-path", classes.resolve(module))
040        .add("-implicit:none")
041        .outputDirectoryForClasses(computeOutputDirectoryForClasses(module, release))
042        .addAll(javaSourceFiles);
043  }
044
045  protected List<JavacCommand> computeMultiReleaseJavacCommands(DeclaredModule module, Path classes) {
046    var commands = new ArrayList<JavacCommand>();
047    for (var release = 9; release <= Runtime.version().feature(); release++) {
048      var roots = module.folders().list(release, FolderType.SOURCES);
049      if (roots.isEmpty()) continue;
050      var sources = new ArrayList<Path>();
051      for (var root : roots) sources.addAll(PathSupport.find(root, 99, PathSupport::isJavaFile));
052      commands.add(computeMultiReleaseJavacCommand(release, module.name(), classes, sources));
053    }
054    return commands;
055  }
056
057  protected List<JavacCommand> computeMultiReleaseJavacCommands(Path classes) {
058    var commands = new ArrayList<JavacCommand>();
059    for (var module : space.modules())
060      commands.addAll(computeMultiReleaseJavacCommands(module, classes));
061    return commands;
062  }
063
064  protected JarCommand computeJarCommand(DeclaredModule module, Path classes, Path modules) {
065    var name = module.name();
066    var version = project.version().value();
067    var file = modules.resolve(name + "@" + version + ".jar");
068
069    var jar = Command.jar().mode("--create").file(file).add("--module-version", version);
070
071    if (module.mainClass().isPresent()) jar = jar.main(module.mainClass().get());
072
073    var folders = module.folders();
074    var baseSources = folders.list(0, FolderType.SOURCES);
075    if (!baseSources.isEmpty()) jar = jar.filesAdd(classes.resolve(name));
076    var baseResources = folders.list(0, FolderType.RESOURCES);
077    for (var resource : baseResources) jar = jar.filesAdd(resource);
078
079    //    if (computedModulePatches.mode() == PatchMode.CLASSES) {
080    //      var list = computedModulePatches.map().getOrDefault(name, List.of());
081    //      jar = jar.forEach(list, (call, path) -> call.with("-C", path, "."));
082    //    }
083
084    // multi-release
085    for (var release = 9; release <= Runtime.version().feature(); release++) {
086      if (!folders.list(release, FolderType.SOURCES).isEmpty()) {
087        jar = jar.filesAdd(release, computeOutputDirectoryForClasses(name, release));
088      }
089      for (var resource : folders.list(release, FolderType.RESOURCES)) {
090        jar = jar.filesAdd(release, resource);
091      }
092    }
093
094    return jar;
095  }
096
097  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForClasses() {
098    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "classes-" + computeReleaseVersionFeatureNumber());
099  }
100
101  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForClasses(String module, int release) {
102    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "classes-mr-" + release, module);
103  }
104
105  @Override
106  public void run() {
107    var modules = space.modules().values();
108    if (modules.isEmpty()) {
109      bach.logMessage("No %s module present".formatted(space.name()));
110      return;
111    }
112    var size = modules.size();
113    bach.logCaption("Compile %d %s module%s".formatted(size, space.name(), size == 1 ? "" : "s"));
114
115    var classesDirectory = computeOutputDirectoryForClasses();
116    var modulesDirectory = computeOutputDirectoryForModules(space);
117    bach.run(computeJavacCommand(classesDirectory));
118    // TODO Compile sources targeted to Java 8
119
120    var multiReleases = computeMultiReleaseJavacCommands(classesDirectory);
121    if (multiReleases.size() >= 1) {
122      bach.logCaption("Compile multi-release sources");
123      multiReleases.stream().parallel().forEach(bach::run);
124    }
125
126    bach.run(Command.of("directories", "clean", modulesDirectory));
127    modules.stream()
128        .parallel()
129        .map(module -> computeJarCommand(module, classesDirectory, modulesDirectory))
130        .forEach(bach::run);
131  }
132}
